import colors from"assets/theme/base/colors";import typography from"assets/theme/base/typography";import borders from"assets/theme/base/borders";const{info,inputBorderColor,dark}=colors;const{size}=typography;const{borderWidth}=borders;const input={styleOverrides:{root:{fontSize:size.sm,color:dark.main,"&:hover:not(.Mui-disabled):before":{borderBottom:`${borderWidth[1]} solid ${inputBorderColor}`},"&:before":{borderColor:inputBorderColor},"&:after":{borderColor:info.main}}}};export default input;
